meanings.definition: The stage in the life cycle of an insect between the larva and pupa.
meanings.sent1: The prepupas were carefully observed by the scientists in the lab.
meanings.sent2: In the garden, we found several prepupas hanging from the leaves.
meanings.sent3: The prepupas decided to have a race to see who would transform first.
meanings.sent4: The prepupas were like tiny time capsules waiting to reveal their secrets.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, the prepupas seemed to glow with potential.
